lines: 1. â€™da tshisima tsha vhutshilo, ndi a U renda Iwe,
Ndi lutsinga lwa tshilidzi, lwo fanelaho thendo,
Mmpfunze u U hulisa-vho, hu vhoneswe Mudzimu,
Mbilu yanga kha i dale, lufuno na dakalo.
2. nne ndi fulufhela Iwe, U tombo li tshidzaho,
Ndi fulufhela u tshidzwa, u swikela U tshi da,
Ndi Yesu we a ndzhenisa, ngomu sambini lawe,
Dzikhomboni nda di tshidzwa, nga malofha a Yesu
3. Ndi na mulandu muhulu, wa tshilidzi tsha Yesu,
Mphe-vho u luga hau, ndi vhuyele ha Iwe,
Ndi na zwivhi zwinzhi Yesu, ndi di lata kha Iwe,
U i dzhie mbilu yanga, i lavhelese Iwe.
